risk.title: Important Disclaimer
risk.description: Trading cryptocurrencies involves a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. You could lose some or all of your principal, and should only invest money you can afford to lose. Carefully consider your investment objectives, experience, and risk tolerance before proceeding.
risk.checkbox: I have read and understand the risks involved.

priceImpactInfo.title: What is Price Impact?
priceImpactInfo.description: Exchanging large amounts reduces return. Available rate may not reflect best deal.
tips: Break your exchange into smaller amounts
Trade when more people are trading
Use lower amount for better rates
